revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = <!-- Size of RAM --> |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = LG Innotek TWFMKB304D |rad1modif = USB (non-standard connector) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43234; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :H.264 Full Frame at HD 720p
"RNTW-MN05A Rev 0.7", "2012.07.13", and "M1X3" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The FCC test report lists additional submodels of.. *IPN100HD-5110 *IPN100HD-5110PIR
The device is using an '''LG Innotek''' TWFMKB304D wireless module (FCC ID: YZP-TWFMKB304D, KCC ID: KCC-CRM-LGW-TWFMKB304D). :The MAC label affixed to the device in the photos has a 94:44:44 ('''LG Innotek''') OUI.
This device is dual stream and based on the DaVinci chipset from TI. All cameras newer than 2 years from '''UDP Technology''' are based on the same CPU module and run the same firmware. :This device also includes advanced [[wikipedia:Video content analysis|video content analysis]] with object based detection. With an additional license, it can do line and area based counting, classification, and speed filtering.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.udptechnology.com/products/IP/IPN100HD.html Product page] ([http://www.udptechnology.com Manufacturer's website])
